docs.text: i feel sorry for the financial backers of " waterworld , " which is supposedly the most expensive film ever made ( at $172 million ! ) , and is also one of the stupidest - boy did they get ripped off !
docs.label: negative

docs.text: in fact , this film is not really a movie , but more of an amusement park ride with a plot .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it's not even just another case of cliches strung together ( well , it is that too ) , it's something that's painful to watch because it relishes in its flaws .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: kevin costner stars as a man who is some kind of mutant half man/half fish .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: he is an explorer/mariner on an alternate earth that is completely covered by water because the polar ice caps melted .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: he's referred to as the mariner , but they " the meaner " would have been a more appropriate title because he's cold , rigid , and strict - and he's supposed the be the good guy !
docs.label: negative

docs.text: he docks at a small floating village of sorts .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: he trades dirt for money and this introduces us to the other important characters .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: first we meet one of the villains , then the soon-to-be heroine , a child prodigy , a wacky inventor , and a group of primitive people that somehow have some of the technology we have today , but also some of the low-tech tools used by pirates and vikings .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: immediately the film's biggest flaw is apparent : are these people primitive or highly advanced ?
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it doesn't seem like anyone can read yet they have ski-doos and airplanes !
docs.label: negative

docs.text: how are these things powered ?
docs.label: negative

docs.text: and if they have airplanes , couldn't they just keep flying until they reached dry land ?
docs.label: negative

docs.text: also , if the planet is completely covered in water where did they get the materials to make these things ?
docs.label: negative

docs.text: i'm sorry , i'm all for checking your brain at the door when going to the movies , but elements like these cannot go unnoticed because they draw our attention away from the story and confuse us .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: there was potential here for a good pirate story set in medieval times before modern technology , so why mix the two together ?
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it doesn't make any sense .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: there really isn't much of a plot here because the story moves so quickly it never takes time to explain anything .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the only thing we learn is that the prodigy child , enola ( mojorino ) , has a tattoo on her back that is supposedly a map to " dryland . "
docs.label: negative

docs.text: who put the tattoo there and how come it has taken them this long to figure this out ?
docs.label: negative

docs.text: we never get an answer , just a stupid action movie about whoever can get the girl will be the victor of sorts if they reach dryland .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: to make a long , boring , stupid , and just plain bad story short ; the mariner escapes with a woman named helen ( tripplehorn ) and enola .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: they sail for a long time , encountering some strange people in the process and fight off " the smokers " as lead by the idiot villain deacon ( hopper ) , who kidnaps enola .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the story becomes a overly grand adventure with the mariner taking on an army of goons , rescuing enola , and bringing them all to salvation ( how original ) .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: even with all its special effects , action , and adventure this film is boring .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: not a single character is likable , therefore neither is the plot .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: dennis hopper completely rips off jack nicholson's joker , while costner just plain rips .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: still , " waterworld " is professionally made with a good production design and an original idea but no substance to it .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: i just hope they don't make a sequel !
docs.label: negative
